tool_description: Searches and filters products in the catalog using various criteria including name, SKU, category, brand, and custom attributes.

search_term.description: General search term to match against product names and descriptions

category.description: Category name or ID to filter by

status.description: Product status: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, or ALL

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-1000)

sort_by.description: Sort field: NAME, SKU, PRICE, or DATE_CREATED

error_messages: Invalid price range: min_price cannot be greater than max_price.
Invalid status filter: Status must be ACTIVE, INACTIVE, or ALL.
Invalid limit: Limit must be between 1 and 1000.
Invalid sort field: Sort field must be NAME, SKU, PRICE, or DATE_CREATED.
Invalid sort order: Sort order must be ASC or DESC.
usage: Provide any combination of search criteria. Use search_term for general text matching, specific fields for exact filtering, and configure result limits and sorting. All search parameters are optional but at least one should be provided for meaningful results.

total_results.description: Total number of products matching the search criteria

returned_count.description: Number of products returned in this response

product_ids.description: Array of product IDs matching the search criteria

product_names.description: Array of product names corresponding to the product IDs

skus.description: Array of SKUs corresponding to the products
